overview: "Treasures of Ukraine" captures, at last, in breathtaking color the folk dress, customs and traditions formerly seen only in displays and never before woven into a life size film. Here are forty-five minutes of song, dance and a fashion show with beautiful models in a natural scenic background displaying the unusual and authentic Ukrainian costumes. Never again, will you see such a beautiful picture. A movie which took 2 1/2 years in the making, now finally, here it is for you to see and hear.
title: The Treasurers of the Ukraine
